title: HL7 v2/v3
description: Messaging standards that define the structure and format of data exchange between healthcare systems. HL7 v2 uses a pipe-delimited format for clinical and administrative messages, while HL7 v3 uses XML for more structured and robust data exchange.
author: Health Level Seven International

title: CDA
description: Clinical Document Architecture (CDA) is an HL7 document standard that structures clinical documents such as discharge summaries and progress notes using XML, enabling standardized clinical document exchange.
author: Health Level Seven International

title: SNOMED-CT
description: Systematized Nomenclature of Medicine â€“ Clinical Terms (SNOMED-CT) is a comprehensive, multilingual clinical terminology that provides standardized vocabulary for clinical concepts, supporting consistent data representation and decision support.
author: SNOMED International
